summary: A standalone mod that will change the appearances of female NPCs (except Orcs and beasts) at Old Hroldan, Markarth (including Left-Hand Mine), Rorikstead, Karthwasten, Dragonbridge, and Thalmor Embassy. Currently a WIP as I am aiming to reduce the numbers of ESP used and occurances of Dark face bugs.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][b][color=#ff0000][u]NOTICE[/u]:[/color][/b][b] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80479/?]Dames of Skyrim Complete/Legendary[/url][/b] has been uploaded and available.[/size]


[size=6][img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/71778-0-1449373542.png[/img][/size]

[color=#ff0000][size=6][b][u]FOREWORD[/u][/b][/size][/color]

[size=3]This is still a [/size][b]Work-In-Progress[/b][size=3] version so not all the females are modded. Updates and notices will be posted soon.[/size]
[size=3]The good part about this mod is that it doesn't pose any trouble when updating as opposed to followers/companions[/size]
[size=3]which requires to be dismissed before any update. This is not a lore-friendly mod (does everything have to be since[/size]
[size=3]there is no page I can find that their hair needs to be in some specific style). The only intention of this mod is[/size]
[size=3]to change female NPC appearance and nothing more (who doesn't want to make their Skyrim sexy?). Thank goodness[/size]
[size=3]that Skyrim's a single player game (which some have failed to comprehend). If you feel that this mod is not[/size]
[size=3]lore-friendly to your game, save yourself the trouble and DO NOT INSTALL this mod. Mod creators make their mods[/size]
[size=3]as how they are personally envisioned. I will not charge money for this mod. All mods used to create this mod is/was[/size]
[size=3]created by respective mod creators mentioned in the description's credits and in no way do I own them. All mods[/size]
[size=3]and tools have been used to create this mod is intended to change female NPC appearances only as mentioned.

[/size][img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/72168-1-1456032588.jpg[/img]


[color=#ff0000][size=6][b][u]DESCRIPTION[/u]:[/b][/size][/color]
[size=3]
A standalone mod that will change the appearances of female NPCs (except Orcs and beasts) at Old Hroldan,
Markarth (including Left-Hand Mine), Karthwasten, Dragonbridge, Rorikstead, and Thalmor Embassy. Will
eventually be rolling in to modding other female NPCs at outlying locations around Solitude to complete Series 2.
[/size]

[color=#ff0000][size=6][b][u]DAMES OF SKYRIM SERIES 2 Background[/u]:[/b][/size][/color]

[size=3]To simplify, this is a continuation of [/size][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71778/?]Dames of [/url][/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71778/?][size=3]Skyrim Series 1[/size][/url][size=3] which has been released on the 1st week of[/size]
[size=3]December 2015. My intention for this mod is to change appearances of most female NPCs (excluding Orcs,[/size]
[size=3]Argonians, and Khajiits) as I used to see them with generic faces and their extended chins (I wonder why some[/size]
[size=3]carry a dagger when their chins alone are considered dangerous weapons).
[/size]

[img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/72168-1-1451000324.jpg[/img]
[color=#b6b6b6][size=2]You look beautiful, Mena. Just as your daughter who's the next Sybil of Dibella.[/size][/color]


[size=3]Work's basically inspired by creator of [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40038/?]Bijin Warmaidens[/url][/b] and [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63473/?]Bijin Wives[/url][/b] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2650523/?]rxkx22[/url] (thanks for making the game look[/size][/center][center][size=3]and feel much better). The work done put in is extremely beautiful that I intentionally dodged modding those NPCs.[/size]
[size=3]As well as [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59269/?]KS Hairdos Female NPC Overhaul[/url] [/b]by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1975658/?]frostsmith[/url] which has the longest duration in my mods list (thanks for[/size]
[size=3]sharing). The work they put in has undeniably made better looking NPCs far from the original vanilla look. But I've[/size]
[size=3]been itching for the longest time to push this project forward so I took the time to actually understand how to[/size]
[size=3]create/mod NPCs without changing any (as much as possible) of the default assets already done by [b][url=http://bethsoft.com/]Bethesda[/url][/b].[/size]


[img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/72168-3-1451000324.jpg[/img]
[color=#b6b6b6][size=2]Orla.... ....ORLA... ...OR... ...Ahem. 'Scuse me. I get carried away whenever I take away their clothes for better shots.[/size][/color]


[size=3]Again, not all the female NPCs have been edited/modded as this time since it's still a Work In Progress.
But just like any other mods, this will progress into [/size][size=3]eventually on the next rotation. As for further mods on
other females throughout the game, I've already started modding female NPCs [/size][size=3]for the other holds. As mentioned,
this mod also retains default [/size][size=3]NPCs' weight as well as assets have been retained[/size][size=3]. Only their heads and hair
styles have been modded. In most instance, said assets are already in default game's assets.


[img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/72168-8-1451000324.jpg[/img][/size]
[color=#b6b6b6]In-game appearance of Hroki from Markarth at the Silver-Blood Inn[/color]

[b][color=#ff0000][size=6][u]REQUIREMENTS[/u]:[/size][/color][/b]

[size=3]Skyrim version 1.9
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition by Caliente
 [b][/b][/url][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99[/url][/b][/b][/size][b]

[/b]
[b][color=#ff0000][size=6][u]INSTALLATION[/u]:[/size][/color][/b]

[size=3]Install with either Nexusmods Manager or Mod Organizer.

[b][color=#ff0000][size=6][u]FAQs[/u]:[/size][/color][/b]

[size=3]Q: I installed CBBE. Do I need to install the UNP version too?
[/size]A: No. You install CBBE version for CBBE. UNP version for UNP.

[size=3]Q: I have SeveNBase in my game. How can I make use of the UNP version?
[/size]A: Copy the following files from your "\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\Skyrim\Data\meshes\actors\character\character assets"

1stpersonfemalehands_0.nif
1stpersonfemalehands_1.nif
femalebody_0.nif
femalebody_1.nif
femalefeet_0.nif
femalefeet_1.nif
femalehands_0.nif
femalehands_1.nif

to "\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\Skyrim\Data\meshes\avatar3s\SKW_Markarth\Common".
Basically, the UVW mapping of UNP, UNPB, and SeveNBase share the same UV layout.

Q: Can I get these in individual installation?
A: No. You're just making things difficult.

Q: Home come the eyes are red? Sometimes they're blue.
A: That's usually ENB causing it when NPC is outdoors. Put them indoors and their eyes are normal.

Q: Are the NPCs wearing the same set of clothes you have in your game?
A: No. When they were put together in Creation Kit, I specified default. Whatever
clothing mod you have, it applies to that. In my case, it's Little Sexy Apparel Replacer.

Q: How come you mentioned HDT when the ones you uploaded don't have HDT.
A: Too much HDT all over the game makes the NPCs disappear OR not render at all.

Q: Are you going to combine them into one giant mod?
A: No. I haven't merged any of my mods because I like to keep them loose. Easier
for me to make things personalized or customized to my preference.

Q: Are you planning to release all Series completed?
A: More on planning to make my mod compatible to Bijin Warmaidens and Bijin Wives.
However, someone also suggested that I create another DOS with said characters from
Warmaidens and Wives just to have variety and options altogether which I might do eventually.
Currently, I'm also doing a DOS Legendary Series which requires Dawnguard, Dragonborn, and
Hearthfire altogether. Here are sample of what I have so far.

[img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/72168-1-1456039132.jpg[/img][/size]
[color=#b6b6b6]Bard Sonir at Winstad Manor, Hjaalmarch[/color]

[img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/72168-0-1456039132.jpg[/img]
[color=#b6b6b6]Bard Oriella at Heljarchen Hall, Pale.[/color]


[b][color=#ff0000][size=6][u]UNINSTALL[/u]:[/size][/color][/b]

[size=3]Uninstall whichever mod manager you are using, be it Nexusmods Manager or Mod Organizer.[/size]

[/url][/b][b][color=#ff0000][size=6][u]SPECIAL THANKS[/u]:[/size][/color]

[/b][size=3]- To my loving wife and wonderful kids who'd put up with me during late nights of modding. Lots of love.[/size]

[size=3]- Creators of NIF Skope - thanks for making life easier when dealing with NPC's heads. YOU ROCK![/size]
